A4.text: The Apennines are a mountain range consisting of parallel smaller chains extending c.â€‰1,200 km (750 mi) the length of peninsular Italy.

A5.text: Since 2000 the Environment Ministry of Italy, following the recommendations of the Apennines Park of Europe Project, has defined the Apennines System to include the mountains of north Sicily, a total distance of 1,500 kilometres (930 mi).
